abstract: Bill Cunningham shares photos of stylish New Yorkers enjoying warmer, spring-like weather.

headline.main: Bill Cunningham | Cure for the Cold

snippet: Women and men came out of their winter cocoons like butterflies in light, colorful clothes. Legs were bared.
lead_paragraph: Women and men came out of their winter cocoons like butterflies in light, colorful clothes. Legs were bared.
